ComicInfo.Summary: There are some things a man just shouldn't know about himself...and Jackie is exposed to them all when his Spirit Guide -- the former Cyberforce mainstay known as Ripclaw -- takes him on a mystical mystery tour of his life. It's all part of a cram course in the power of the Darkness, as Jackie prepares to battle the enigmatic Conquistador and his army of baby faced warriors. All this, and who does Robert Bearclaw put in charge of guarding their bodies while they tour the spirit planes? Capris Castagilione, Jackie's twisted twin sister!
ComicInfo.Tags: Jackie Estacado,Capris Castiglione,Ripclaw,Darklings,New York Police Department,Jenny Romano,Sonatine
ComicInfo.Title: Ripclaw (Part Two)
